about_the_game:
!!CAUTION!!

I'm planning to incorporate "English" into the language of this game, but since I'm not good at English, most of the sentences will be machine translated. Please keep this in mind if you are planning to play this game in English.

"Interplanetary love guide" is a "love simulation game" set in the distant future, where privately owned spaceships fly around and interstellar travel is commonplace.

As you explore the map, you advance the story by choosing options that appear in conversations with characters.

●SUMMARY

In order to investigate aliens, the protagonist gets on a second-hand spaceship and lands on the planet Anderes with support AI John.

Anderes is a planet very similar to Earth, and is a developing planet with many islands floating on it.

There, let's deepen interaction with friendly aliens (Yatoko, Dracs, Theloema).

Investigate each alien and respond appropriately to each alien. Depending on your response, they may open up or become hostile.

●ALIEN DESCRIPTION

●Yatoko

Average lifespan: 45-55 years

A fox-like alien with big ears and a big tail.

For most aliens, Yatoko possesses advanced technical capabilities and technology that can be considered unknown and beyond comprehension, and no alien would interfere with or oppose Yatoko.

Yatoko develops weapons and various devices and sells them for a living while traveling between planets in a spaceship.

●Dracs

Average lifespan: 300-310 years

It has transparent horns that look like jewels and a long tail with scales.

They live at a civilization level that is equal to or slightly inferior to humans, but they also use tools and weapons from other aliens without resistance.

Due to their sharp claws and fangs and high fighting ability, many Dracs were forced to work as battle slaves during the great space war period.

●Theloema

Average lifespan: Seems to be immortal

It has slightly pointed ears and is highly allergic to sunlight.

An alien who has special abilities such as physical enhancement and teleportation, and who needs to regularly ingest human blood.

There is a history of treating humans as livestock on their home planet, but this is now obsolete because blood packs are easy and cheap to obtain.

●PARTNER CANDIDATES（some）

This is a character you can meet early on.

●Lifelaease

Young Dracs. They sell items to the main character.

When you first meet them, they are curt and their expressions do not change much, but as you get to know them, they begin to smile.

●Moumeu

Yatoko girl. She has decorative implants in her eyes that project emotional symbols into her eyes. (exclamation mark, star, heart, etc.)

She is friendly, but as the protagonist calls out to her several times, her behavior becomes suspicious.

●Mehama

Theloema. He doesn't do much with you when you first meet him, but once you get to know him, he's very kind.

He is rich and likes to drink.

●FEATURES OF THIS GAME

  • Crime, violence, blood, and cruel depictions and settings

  • The main character can be male or female. You can also change the name.(no change in story)

  • 6 love candidates

  • This includes sleepover events and events where you can have a date.

  • Exploration hours are from morning until night.

  • There are two types of endings for each person. There are two normal endings. (14 types in total)

  • You need to improve your likability(Have a conversation that they like and give them a gift)

  • Event CG exists.

●From the creator

As this is still a work in progress, the above information is subject to change.

As for the type of ending, I'm not sure whether to add a bad ending.

The setting of this game is inspired by a certain colony simulation game, so there are many depictions of illegal drugs and unethical aspects.

There are many depictions that are not very good when compared with actual laws, so we recommend playing this game if you understand that it is a work of fiction.

There may be one more character added.

Please let me know if there are any mistakes in the translation.

name: 異星間恋愛ガイド ‐Interplanetary love guide‐

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: This PC game is a love simulation game set in the distant future where interstellar travel has become commonplace. Slavery, crime, violence... Interact with unique aliens and form close relationships with them in a world where anything is possible, where high technology and low technology coexist.
